title: Applies common ggplot theme elements to chart — themer
Applies common ggplot theme elements to chart — themer
text: ggplot object elements : theme( legend.title = element_blank(), legend.position = "right", legend.direction = "vertical", axis.title.x = element_blank(), axis.title.y = element_blank(), panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"), plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white"), legend.background = element_rect(fill = "white"), strip.background = element_rect(fill = "white"), legend.key = element_rect(fill = "white"), strip.text.y = element_text(angle = 0), plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5), plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust = 0.5) )

title: Applies common ggplot theme elements to chart — themer
code: cars %>% ggplot(aes(x = speed, y = dis)) %>% geom_line() + themer() #> Error in cars %>% ggplot(aes(x = speed, y = dis)) %>% geom_line(): could not find function "%>%"
